name: Pachinko
description:
This is a VERY exciting pachinko that I did on a Sunday afternoon, I had finished my exams and in something I had to occupy my time.

Controls

  • Play with only one button, press and hold the space bar to throw the balls.
  • The map is generated randomly, press R to generate it again.
  • Mute music with M.
  • And you can exit by pressing escape.
